posts.post_content:
Sale pending on the SGC 96/9 ... I mean 50/4. Thanks.

I mistakenly bought two Bill Bradley portraits and would like to sell one. Paid $50 for the SGC 45/3.5 and $85 for the SGC 50/4. As you probably know, few cards are offered on the B/S/T that aren't undergraded, and the 50/4 is no exception. Has the corners of a 9!!!!!

OK, it doesn't, but it is a really nice 4.

I'll pay the stupid tax of 10 percent and sell the 45/3.5 for $45 delivered or the 50/4 for $76 delivered. Any type of payment is fine.

Thanks, Rob

wolfie51sb at aol.com
Enough with the hyperbole, Rob...those are the corners of an 8 at best!
